item.title: Nearest Neighbor Classification
item.description: Nearest Neighbor Classification Procedures Assemble a data set (training set) How to classify a new image x? find its closest neighbor y, and label it the same Notes: training set of 60000 images test set of 10000 images How do we determine if two data (images) are closest? With 28 x 28 image, we can strech it to become a vector of 784.
